news.title: Donald Trump confirms pharma tariff will be 15pc for EU as White House reveals fact sheet on trade deal
news.summary: The new tariff on pharma imports to America from the EU will be 15pc, the White House has confirmed in a new fact sheet it has published today.

news.title: Justin Kelly confirmed as new Garda Commissioner
news.summary: The Government has appointed Justin Kelly to the post of Garda Commissioner, replacing Drew Harris, who will retire later this year.

news.title: Man jailed for six years over attack on Alanna Quinn Idris which blinded her in one eye
news.summary: A man who procured an attack on a young woman, which resulted in her losing vision permanently in one eye, has been jailed for six years.

news.title: Cat Deeley and Patrick Kielty announce separation after more than decade of marriage
news.summary: TV presenters Cat Deeley and Patrick Kielty have separated after more than a decade of marriage, they said in a statement.

news.title: Former garda who incited men online to rape female colleague jailed for seven years
news.summary: A former garda has been jailed for seven years for impersonating a colleague online and inciting men to go to her home to rape her

news.title: Rúaidhrí O’Connor: Why Garry Ringrose should be seen as a Lions hero despite not playing one Test minute in Australia
news.summary: Garry Ringrose will not play a minute of Test rugby in Australia this summer but he deserves to be remembered as perhaps the ultimate hero of this tour.

news.title: UK will recognise Palestine in September unless Israel ‘takes steps’ over Gaza
news.summary: The UK will recognise the state of Palestine “in September” unless Israel takes “substantive steps” to end the “appalling situation in Gaza”, Prime Minister Keir Starmer has told the country’s cabinet.

news.title: Paul Williams: New garda boss will be a source of unspoken relief for the force and the Government
news.summary: The appointment of Justin Kelly as garda commissioner has come as a welcome development in a police force bogged down by internal dissent, a crisis of morale and an unprecedented brain drain of disillusioned experienced officers.

news.title: Gardaí at scene of three-vehicle crash in Dublin
news.summary: Gardaí and emergency services are currently at the scene of a multi-vehicle road crash in Dublin.

news.title: Kerry FC sensationally dispense with services of player less than a week after signing him
news.summary: Kerry FC have quite remarkably and sensationally dispensed with the services of Shane Maroodza less than a week after signing him.
